SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository

Interface WholesalerProductRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
WholesalerProductRepositoryImpl
public interface WholesalerProductRepository
WholesalerProductRepository is an interface for managing and performing operations on wholesaler products including finding, adding, updating, and deleting products related to wholesalers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addWholesalerProduct(WholesalerProductDTO product)
    Adds a new product to the database for a wholesaler.
    void
    deleteWholesalerProduct(String id)
    Deletes a product from the database based on its unique ID.
    List<WholesalerProductDetailsDTO>
    findByPid(String pid, String userPostalCode)
    Finds products based on a product ID and the user's postal code, returning details of each matching product.

    findBySwp_id(String swp_id)
    Retrieves a product by its unique ID (swp_id).

    Finds all products associated with a specific wholesaler by their UEN.

  • Method Details

    • findByUEN

      List<ProductDetailedDTO> findByUEN(String uen) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds all products associated with a specific wholesaler by their UEN.
      Parameters:
      uen - the unique entity number of the wholesaler
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDetailedDTO objects containing detailed product information
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findByPid

      List<WholesalerProductDetailsDTO> findByPid(String pid, String userPostalCode) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, IOException
      Finds products based on a product ID and the user's postal code, returning details of each matching product.
      Parameters:
      pid - the product ID to search for
      userPostalCode - the postal code of the user, used to calculate distance
      Returns:
      a list of WholesalerProductDetailsDTO containing product details and location information
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException
      IOException

    • findBySwp_id

      WholesalerProductDTO findBySwp_id(String swp_id) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a product by its unique ID (swp_id).
      Parameters:
      swp_id - the unique wholesaler product identifier
      Returns:
      a WholesalerProductDTO containing product details
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getWholesalerProductName

      String getWholesalerProductName(String swp_id) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the name of a product based on the wholesaler product ID (swp_id).
      Parameters:
      swp_id - the unique wholesaler product identifier
      Returns:
      the name of the product as a String
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getWholesalerProductDesc

      Parameters:
      swp_id - the unique wholesaler product identifier
      Returns:
      the description of the product as a String

      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

      String getWholesalerProductImg(String swpId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the image URL of a product based on its unique ID (swp_id).
      Parameters:
      swpId - the unique wholesaler product identifier
      Returns:
      the image URL of the product as a String
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • addWholesalerProduct

      void addWholesalerProduct(WholesalerProductDTO product)
      Adds a new product to the database for a wholesaler.
      Parameters:
      product - a WholesalerProductDTO object containing details of the product to be added

    • updateWholesalerProduct

      void updateWholesalerProduct(String id, Map<String,Object> updates) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates details of an existing product by its unique ID (swp_id).
      Parameters:
      id - the unique wholesaler product identifier
      updates - a Map of fields and values to update
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • deleteWholesalerProduct

      void deleteWholesalerProduct(String id)
      Deletes a product from the database based on its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique product identifier

    • getWProductByPIDandUEN

      WholesalerProducts getWProductByPIDandUEN(String pid, String uen) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a product based on its product ID (pid) and the UEN of the wholesaler.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a WholesalerProducts object containing details of the product
